test.name: Test log in Page

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'ยินดีต้อนรับเข้าสู่ระบบจัดการข้อมูลวิจัยของสาขาวิชาวิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์'.
kw.arg: ยินดีต้อนรับเข้าสู่ระบบจัดการข้อมูลวิจัยของสาขาวิชาวิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

test.doc: Test admin login and navigate to each page after language change from English to Thai.

test.name: Test Navigate To User Profile

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//span[contains(text(), 'โปรไฟล์ผู้ใช้')]'.
kw.arg: xpath=//span[contains(text(), 'โปรไฟล์ผู้ใช้')]
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'บัญชี'.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//a[@id='account-tab' and contains(@class, 'nav-link') and contains(., 'บัญชี')]'.
kw.arg: xpath=//a[@id='account-tab' and contains(@class, 'nav-link') and contains(., 'บัญชี')]
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//a[@id='password-tab' and contains(@class, 'nav-link') and contains(., 'รหัสผ่าน')]'.
kw.arg: xpath=//a[@id='password-tab' and contains(@class, 'nav-link') and contains(., 'รหัสผ่าน')]
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

test.doc: Test that clicking "โปรไฟล์ผู้ใช้" to the User Profile page without re-login.

test.name: Test Navigate To Funds Management

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//span[contains(text(), 'จัดการกองทุน')]'.
kw.arg: xpath=//span[contains(text(), 'จัดการกองทุน')]
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'ทุนวิจัย'.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'ทุนภายใน'.

test.doc: Test that clicking "จัดการกองทุน" navigates to the funds management page.

test.name: Test Navigate To Research Projects

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//span[contains(text(), 'โครงการวิจัย')]'.
kw.arg: xpath=//span[contains(text(), 'โครงการวิจัย')]
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//tr[@role='row']//td[4]' should have contained text 'พุธษดี' but its text was 'Pusadee'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
kw.status: Element 'xpath=//tr[@role='row']//td[4]' should have contained text 'พุธษดี' but its text was 'Pusadee'.

test.doc: Test that clicking "โครงการวิจัย" navigates to the research projects page.
test.status: Element 'xpath=//tr[@role='row']//td[4]' should have contained text 'พุธษดี' but its text was 'Pusadee'.
